ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Melee Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Slyde, I sure seemed like I was getting a lot more 30ish and 40ish hits, but no solid evidence. I think I hit 51 for the first time with my BOH though. A
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Slyde,

I sure seemed like I was getting a lot more 30ish and 40ish hits, but no
solid evidence. I think I hit 51 for the first time with my BOH though.

A lower level Bard in our guild said his solo fear-kiting time was much
more efficient.

Tzeetch, Troubador of Tunes
The Commune, Xegony

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:

Wow no posts here in ages. Anyone notice any major changes with the New
Melee skills? I had mostly a wasted night (long CR - and also fighting
greens for faction) - so I have no feel yet

Slyde Katzenjammer
57 Bard - Xegony
Dragons of Kel`Dar


=====
John Grady
